macroData.name: Unstoppable Momentum (Reminder)

description.value:
Unstoppable Momentum (15th-level Garou feature)

Your Rage has evolved from blind fury into relentless forward motion. Once unleashed, it is difficult to halt—but never effortless.

While you are raging, you gain the following benefits:

  • Iron Instincts. You have advantage on saving throws against the paralyzed, stunned, and restrained conditions.
  • Relentless Advance. You ignore nonmagical difficult terrain while moving. Magical difficult terrain costs you no additional movement unless it is created by a creature of CR equal to or greater than your Garou level (DM’s discretion).
  • Predatory Rush. Your normal movement speed is now effectively equal to your dash speed during your Rage.

These benefits end immediately when your Rage ends.
